00036 #ifndef _EVENT_H
00037 #define _EVENT_H

00041 
00042 #define ACTIVE 1
00043 #define INACTIVE 0
00044 
00045 /************************
00046 * Structure de donnees
00047 *************************/
00048 typedef struct _Event {
00050    double agx,agy,agz;
00052    double agxoff,agyoff,agzoff;
00054    double ax,ay,az;        
00056    double axoff,ayoff,azoff;     
00058    double ang;       
00060    double pulse_duration;     
00062    double acq_delay;    
00064     int acq_flag;    
00066    int op_flag;   
00068    int spoiling_flag;   
00070    int nu_pointx,nu_pointy,nu_pointz;
00071     } EVENT;
00072
